lead_paragraph: Daniel Pantaleo’s disciplinary history should remain confidential, Mayor Bill de Blasio said, disagreeing with many members of the City Council and a judge’s ruling.

headline.print_headline: Calls to See Record of Officer in Garner Case Are Renewed
headline.main: Record of Officer in Eric Garner Case Should Be Public, Officials Argue

snippet: Daniel Pantaleo’s disciplinary history should remain confidential, Mayor Bill de Blasio said, disagreeing with many members of the City Council and a judge’s ruling....
abstract: Group of elected officials and activists gather outside of New York City Hall to demand release of basic findings of misconduct against New York Police Officer Daniel Pantaleo, who applied fatal chokehold to Eric Garner on Staten Island in 2014.
